ai-tika-s0403t10:2_1: you should correct them a third time.
ai-tika-s0403t10:2_2: In the second territory, alms-food, lodging, and medicines and supplies for the sick. And the enemy, you should approach and pay homage to him.
ai-tika-s0403t10:2_3: Then there is no obstacle for him to going to the such-and-such a place where there is no danger of any such-and-such a one who has purified his foes, and who possesses mindfulness of breathing. So he should approach them and ask for the sake of his instructions.
ai-tika-s0403t10:2_4: These are called the beautified by the wind, or the householder’s husband.
ai-tika-s0403t10:2_5: the princess called Kumārakassapa, the great princess,
ai-tika-s0403t10:2_7: For when approaching they are unable to go to the preventry, ending, gratification, drawback, and escape. That is why he should not look down on material pleasures.
ai-tika-s0403t10:2_10: (but) if he approaches each other, he should approach the preliminary work connected with the fundamentals of the spiritual life, and he should not approach them if he is sick, he should not approach them.
ai-tika-s0403t10:3_0: The commentary on the beautiful, etc.
ai-tika-s0403t10:5_1: There are five kinds of bodily action that are disciplined with loving-kindness,
ai-tika-s0403t10:5_3: and the Collection of the Buddha.
ai-tika-s0403t10:5_4: And if it is clear, there is no-one else, in whom there is present to him, he said, “Noble One.”
ai-tika-s0403t10:5_5: Living in private, they are absorption;
ai-tika-s0403t10:5_6: And although there is no effective action, whatever bodily action there is heading for you there is no further.
ai-tika-s0403t10:5_7: These are the following methods who abides in loving-kindness, etc., as well as a householder although they are preferred to them even in the case of the pervasion of loving-kindness, etc., as well.
ai-tika-s0403t10:5_8: I have good bodily conduct, verbally and mental behavior.
ai-tika-s0403t10:5_9: and when he saw the Bhikkhu fraternity at the foreign land of the Cetiya mountain, he going for alms to the village of Cetiyapabbata Monastery, where he saw the monks sitting down, prepared seats, and using his bowl and robe, said,
ai-tika-s0403t10:5_10: To-King Mettiya and Bhagavat I recite the Teaching as well.
ai-tika-s0403t10:5_11: (but) “We will go to the place for the sake of the (of the Bodhisatta and Precept) to the Fraternity. We will take a meal to the Sangha, and also show the four friends and colleagues, “We will give laughing and floor covers, let us bows down to him. We will give you a seat and set out a foot-stool, a foot-scraper, and prepare a seat for the Rains.” Then we will do what is said, “We will do so now,lector,” and constellecrats to the restrain, taking up, addresses, making amends for the four reasons.”
ai-tika-s0403t10:5_12: When the monks’ calls his body, he should go to the shrine of the loving-kindness, where he sat down, matchmakers and girls, and when they think, “May they be happy and free from enmity, affliction and anxiety, and live happily.”
ai-tika-s0403t10:6_0: Herein, there are nine kinds of robe-cloth: the venerables, the making their head and foot-stoolishing the feet, the senior monks with their feet, and those with arranged their heads at their feet, doing acts of respect toward both the seniors and the wives, transmigrations, and that leading to their grains’.
ai-tika-s0403t10:6_1: “Yes, the senior elder Tissa,” replied the Elder Tissa. Instead of the advice, he uttered a recitation passage, and was loving-kindness. But Mettiya, the Elder Tissa Meteyya, the daughter-in-law’s words, how could the senior venerables come back?”
ai-tika-s0403t10:6_2: and the Elder Mettiya, having performed his duties during the whole of the recitation passage, and washed his lady, commended with loving-kindness on her face with loving-kindness, face-to-face with the Elder Meteyya’s foremost.
ai-tika-s0403t10:6_3: therefore she gave birth to the blessings of loving-kindness, freely glorious deeds, with a confident heart of loving-kindness, compassion for the world, with a confident mind,
ai-tika-s0403t10:6_4: but, when a mind-made body has such power and prosperity, his mind-made, lady of loving-kindness is said: “This isn’t conducive to the opposite sex.”
ai-tika-s0403t10:7_0: When one is lost in those directions, he came together with the mendicants.
ai-tika-s0403t10:7_1: but now we are ever present, both you and your views are both in lesser life.
ai-tika-s0403t10:7_4: emancipatings one who goes to the complete destruction of suffering.
ai-tika-s0403t10:7_5: For it is called one who dedicates himself to the Order who dedicates himself to the suffering of other people.
ai-tika-s0403t10:7_6: The bones of the teacher (afterwards) doing what belongs to him, and practice accordingly.
ai-tika-s0403t10:7_8: having the view that conceives (wrong) view, he is one who has attained (Nibbāna).
ai-tika-s0403t10:8_0: The commentary on the undertaking is finished.
ai-tika-s0403t10:10_1: In the sixth sign: on the earth kasiṇa, the sign of foulness does not appear.
ai-tika-s0403t10:10_2: and he replies his own work, thus he is the virtue of self, and he does not protect himself.
